dtliExcerpt: While Mark Rylance's bravura performance as the insufferable poetaster Valere provides moments of genuine hilarity, David Hirson's verbose comedy proves as much an endurance test for audiences as it is for the fictional theatrical troupe forced to accommodate the bombastic fool.
